name: Chess Dungeon (Okaime)
description:
Game made by:
Eduardo Machado (@moonlitthegame)
Thiago Okaime (@thiagokaime)

Welcome to Chess Dungeons!

Your adventure begins now, but first, let me introduce you into the basics. Here on Chess Dungeons, you control a powerful group of six unique moveset adventurers that can be upgraded using the Power Emblem, on a journey throught that dungeon, they being:
Pawn: 
An scared knight that moves slow, but in his time, can get anywhere. When upgraded with the Power Emblem, he gains courage and determination and each round that passes he increases his power.

Knight:
An horse rider that can jump any wall and attack through enemies, but he can only walk in the shape of an L. When upgraded by the Power Emblem, he throws an powerful Air Attack with the speed he moves in the direction of the curve he made.

Rook:
An strong tank that can resist damage and do tons of damage, besides he can only charge in a straight line but can move very far. When upgraded by the Power Emblem he leaves an trail of fire in the path he charged.

Bishop:
The religious and the healer of the group that can only walk diagonally. He's not very strong but he can help his team by healing them when they're weak. When upgraded by the Power Emblem he realeses an area spell around him when he moves that does damage to enemies and heal allies.

Queen:
The loyal company of the group leader, she can walk in any direction and it's very strong, but also very fragile. When upgraded by the Power Emblem she heals herself when defeats an enemy.

King:
The leader of the group, he cant walk that far but it's very strong, when he dies, your adventure ends. When upgraded by the Power emblem he gives low life allies nearby him an buff that makes them stronger to defend him

Don't forget about energy! it's an important attribute to your fights, everytime you move you take one of the piece, every round you have a chance of winning an energy on a piece you used, but when you run out of energy, and is not lucky enough, you just have to wait some rounds so it is back fully.

You can also found some items by your adventure that helps you out, like potion that heals HP and Energy.

That's it, have fun on your journey and good luck!
